publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-94 Robin Harper: Scottish Whale and Dolphin Sanctuary—That the Parliament notes that the International Whaling Commission (IWC) is presently meeting in Alaska; further notes with concern the IWC vote last year calling for a repeal of the ban on commercial whaling; commends the UK Government for the efforts it is making to reverse that vote, and calls on the Scottish Executive to include making Scottish waters an official whale and dolphin sanctuary in any future marine bill proposal.
S3M-94 Scottish Whale and Dolphin Sanctuary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Michael Matheson*

S3M-94 Robin Harper: Scottish Whale and Dolphin Sanctuary—That the Parliament notes that the International Whaling Commission (IWC) is presently meeting in Alaska; further notes with concern the IWC vote last year calling for a repeal of the ban on commercial whaling; commends the UK Government for the efforts it is making to reverse that vote, and calls on the Scottish Executive to include making Scottish waters an official whale and dolphin sanctuary in any future marine bill proposal. Supported by: Michael Matheson
S3M-94 Scottish Whale and Dolphin Sanctuary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-94 Scottish Whale and Dolphin Sanctuary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Christine Grahame*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-94 Scottish Whale and Dolphin Sanctuary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Stuart McMillan*

S3M-94 Scottish Whale and Dolphin Sanctuary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Rob Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Bill Wilson*, Elaine Smith*, Christina McKelvie*, Cathie Craigie*, Mike Pringle*, Bashir Ahmad*, Ross Finnie*
S3M-94 Scottish Whale and Dolphin Sanctuary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Kenneth Gibson*, Cathy Peattie*
